name: PICODYNE-CORPORATION-LFEM-SIMPLE-DECRYPTION-CLIENT-BETA_0.1.7
description:
============

WARNING: SOFTWARE PRODUCES RAPID FLASHING AND UNPLEASANT NOISES

CONTRACTORS WITH EPILEPSY OR OTHER CONDITIONS WHICH COULD BE WORSENED BY STROBING IMAGES OR UNPLEASANT NOISES SHOULD OPT OUT OF THIS ASSIGNMENT

============

A LOW-FREQUENCY ELECTROMAGNETIC BROADCAST INTERCEPTION + DECRYPTION CLIENT FOR PICODYNE CONTRACTORS ABROAD TO ASSIST OPERATIONS REMOTELY. DESIGNED ON SPEC BY CONTRACTOR #11583.

TO OPERATE: MOVE MOUSE TO LOCATE CLEAR SIGNAL, HOLD STILL WHILE CLIENT EXTRACTS ON-SCREEN DATA, REPEAT. ESC TO EXIT. V TO TOGGLE VISUALIZER.

SESSION SCORE IS TIED TO CID# FOR FUTURE EVALS

UPDATE: ANTENNAE LOCATED IN AZ DESERT NEAR NEWLY UNCOVERED MASSIVE RADIO TELESCOPE ARRAY (>1000 DISHES). THIS ARRAY IS BELIEVED TO BE A PART OF A DEFUNCT XXXXXXXXXXX CORP. INITIATIVE FROM 2002 BUT STILL REMAINS ACTIVE.

SHARECART1000 COMPLIANT. A CONTRIBUTION TO #TEACART1K.
